page.title: 15 INSTALLATION ENGINEER
page.content: My dad is an{Installation Engineer}who instals T.V.s and videos.He drives a van with orange and blue stripes belonging to Rentaset.My dad has a radio in his van so that he can contact Rentaset at any time. Some customers are nice and others are not so pleasant. Sometimes my dad goes around the island. At night my dad goes back to Rentaset to get the T.V.s and videos ready for the next day.. Soon Rentaset will move into town where they will have a bigger shop and a bigger showroom. They will have more customers. I do hope he doesn't retire yet! BY{MONIA DE LA MARE.
